channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 17:22 ATTENTION !!! Repel the threat of using guided aerial bombs (CABs).
item.description: 🟢 17:22 ATTENTION !!! Repel the threat of using guided aerial bombs (CABs). #Zaporizhzhia_district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
